p: To date, flavonoids ( Miki et al., 2007), polyphenols ( Sokmen et al., 2005), alkaloids ( Serkedjieva and Velcheva, 2003), anthocyanins ( Krawitz et al., 2011), chalcones ( Dao et al., 2011), xanthones ( Dao et al., 2012), and homoisoflavonoids ( Jeong et al., 2012) have also been introduced as anti-influenza agents predominantly inhibiting the NA enzyme ( Wang et al., 2006).
